abstract: Saturday Profile of Li Yinhe, leading Chinese advocate for relaxing of sexual norms, who stunned country when she revealed on her blog that her partner of 17 years is transgender man; public reaction since revelation has been surprisingly sympathetic, as has news media coverage, and Li sees in reaction reaffirmation of her view that everyday Chinese are very tolerant, unlike tradition-bound men in charge of country.
lead_paragraph: After a blogger accused her of being a closeted lesbian, Li Yinhe, an advocate of freewheeling sexuality in China, announced that her partner of 17 years is a transgender man.

headline.main: Sex Expert’s Secret Is Out, and China’s Open to It
headline.print_headline: Sex Expert’s Secret Is Out, and China’s Open to It

snippet: After a blogger accused her of being a closeted lesbian, Li Yinhe, an advocate of freewheeling sexuality in China, announced that her partner of 17 years is a transgender man.
